name: @bechara/nestjs-orm
description: ORM Module Component for NestJS Projects

scripts.dev:mysql: export ORM_TYPE=mysql || set ORM_TYPE=mysql&& pnpm mysql && pnpm dev
scripts.dev:postgres: export ORM_TYPE=postgresql || set ORM_TYPE=postgresql&& pnpm postgres && pnpm dev
scripts.mysql: docker start mysql || docker run -d --rm --name mysql -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=nestjs-orm mysql
scripts.postgres: docker start postgres || docker run -d --rm --name postgres -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -e POSTGRES_DB=nestjs-orm postgres
scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && pnpm run index && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && rimraf ./source/index.ts
scripts.test:mysql: export ORM_TYPE=mysql || set ORM_TYPE=mysql&& pnpm mysql && jest --forceExit --verbose --testTimeout=30000 --config .config/jest/.jestrc.json
scripts.test:postgres: export ORM_TYPE=postgresql || set ORM_TYPE=postgresql&& pnpm postgres && jest --forceExit --verbose --testTimeout=30000 --config .config/jest/.jestrc.json
